summary:
This mod adds a new Atronach type called "Snow Atronach".
These atronachs are based on the one from liny.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][b][u][size=4]Description[/size][/u][/b]

This mod adds a new Atronach type called "[u]Snow Atronach[/u]".
These atronachs are based on the [/font][font=Georgia]one from [/font]liny.[font=Georgia]
[u]It adds 2 new playable conjuration spells[/u].
Both spells Summon a Male shaped. flame atronach with a snow and ice, male like body

The spells can be aquired Dragon's Reach (From bookshelf behind the Alchamey table).

[/font]This modification is in alpha and requires testing.

I've sropped this mod so long ago and i want others to enjoy it so here you go anyone may edit this mod

[b][u][size=4]Installation
[/size][/u][/b]
You will require the following mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25994/][b][size=2]Conjure Snow Atronach[/size][/b][/url][size=2] by [b]liny[/b]
[/size][size=2][color=#f4f4f4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14692]Burn Freeze Shock Effects (Loose Files)[/url] [/b]by [b]pauderek[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50316/?]Transparent and Refracting Icicle and Frost Atronach[/url] by[b] Skysan4298[/b][/color][/size]

[size=4][u][b]Future Changes
[/b][/u][/size][size=2]
More snow / ice based spells
[/size]Better Snow Trail
New Animation (Will require assistance)
Model Adjustments
NPC spell list intergration

[size=4][b][u]Change Log[/u][/b][/size]

[b][b]DLC Version 1.5 10-12-2014[/b]
[/b]Graphical Fix to [b][b]DLC Version 1.0 Textures.
[/b][/b]Transparency fixed

[b][b]DLC Version 1.0 10-12-2014[/b]
[/b]Texture Changer released for Version 2.0 to look like 1.5

[b]Version 2.0 10-12-2014
[/b]Texture Update (more snow like)
[b]Requires [/b]Transparent and Refracting Icicle and Frost Atronach
Some graphical Bugs have been fixed

[b]Version 1.5 09-12-2014
[/b]Main File was released
author: Lazzxion
